title: Asia News Network
text:
Asia News Network (ANN) is a news coalition of 24 news organisations from South, Southeast and Northeast Asia, founded in 1999.
Members.
Asia News Network members consist of <a href="The%20Korea%20Herald">The Korea Herald</a>, <a href="China%20Daily">China Daily</a>, <a href="The%20China%20Post">The China Post</a> (Taiwan), <a href="Gogo%20Mongolia">Gogo Mongolia</a>, <a href="The%20Japan%20News">The Japan News</a>, <a href="Dawn%20%28newspaper%29">Dawn</a> (Pakistan), <a href="The%20Statesman%20%28India%29">The Statesman</a> (India), <a href="The%20Island%20%28Sri%20Lanka%29">The Island</a> (Sri Lanka), <a href="Kuensel">Kuensel</a> (Bhutan), <a href="Kathmandu%20Post">Kathmandu Post</a> (Nepal), <a href="The%20Daily%20Star%20%28Bangladesh%29">Daily Star</a> (Bangladesh), <a href="Eleven%20Media">Eleven Media</a> (Myanmar), <a href="The%20Nation%20%28Thailand%29">The Nation</a> (Thailand), <a href="The%20Jakarta%20Post">The Jakarta Post</a> (Indonesia), <a href="The%20Star%20%28Malaysia%29">The Star</a> and <a href="Sin%20Chew%20Daily">Sin Chew Daily</a> (Malaysia), the <a href="Phnom%20Penh%20Post">Phnom Penh Post</a> and <a href="Rasmei%20Kampuchea">Rasmei Kampuchea</a> (Cambodia), <a href="The%20Borneo%20Bulletin">The Borneo Bulletin</a> (Brunei), <a href="The%20Straits%20Times">The Straits Times</a> (Singapore), <a href="Vietnam%20News">Vietnam News</a>, <a href="Philippine%20Daily%20Inquirer">Philippine Daily Inquirer</a> and <a href="Vientiane%20Times">Vientiane Times</a> (Laos).
